images.copyright: Allen's hummingbird perched on a red kangaroo paw plant (© GypsyPictureShow/Shutterstock)
images.title: Let the Great Backyard Bird Count begin!
images.caption: Great Backyard Bird Count
images.desc: The Great Backyard Bird Count has begun! Time to pay more attention to our feathered friends and help scientists learn about wild bird populations. The event runs over four days and will see people using apps and websites to identify local birds and share their sightings from their backyards, or other favorite spots, for as little as 15 minutes a day.
images.bsTitle: Let the Great Backyard Bird Count begin!
